import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../App.css' const Resumen = ({ drivers = [], passengers = [], routes = [] }) => { const [visibleCount, setVisibleCount] = useState(4); const handleShowMore = () => { setVisibleCount(visibleCount + 4); }; const handleShowLess = () => { setVisibleCount(4); }; return (

{drivers.length > visibleCount && ( )} {visibleCount > 4 && ( )}
